createteams-desc: Allows users to [[Special:CreateTeams|create team templates]]. Original version by hainrich.
createteams-templates.json:
{"templates":{"Team":{"wikitext": "[[File:{$image$}|link={$link$}]] {$namewithlink$}","category": "Team Template Standard"},"TeamShort":{"wikitext": "[[File:{$image$}|link={$link$}]] [[{$link$}|{$shortname$}]]","category": "Team Template Short"},"Team2":{"wikitext": "{$namewithlink$} [[File:{$image$}|link={$link$}]]","category": "Team2 Template Standard"},"Team2Short":{"wikitext": "[[{$link$}|{$shortname$}]] [[File:{$image$}|link={$link$}]]","category": "Team2 Template Short"},"TeamBracket":{"wikitext": "[[File:{$image$}|link=]] {$name$}","category": "Team Template Bracket"},"TeamIcon":{"wikitext": "[[File:{$image$}|link={$link$}]]","category": "Team Template Icons"},"TeamPart":{"wikitext": "
[[File:{$image$}|link={$link$}]]
","category": "Team Template Participants"},"TeamPage":{"wikitext": "{$link$}","category": "Team Template Page"}}}
createteams-create-teams-desc: Creates team templates as seen [[Liquipedia:Team templates|here]] for a specific team. If no image link is entered, then the image is supposed to be "Teamlogo std.png".
createteams-create-teams-team-slug-helpe:
(Optional) e.g. "teamsolid"
If empty, this defaults to the lowercase version of the team name.
createteams-create-teams-pagetitle-helpe:
(Optional) e.g. "Team Liquid Alternate Page"
If not empty, then the links will go to this page. Leave empty if the page title is the same as the team name.
createteams-create-teams-image-helper:
e.g. "[[:File:Liquidlogo std.png|Liquidlogo std.png]]"
The name of the team logo file. Dimensions must be 120px x 50px. To upload an image, go to [[Special:Upload]].
createteams-create-teams-image-helper-re:
e.g. "[[:File:Liquidlogo std.png|Liquidlogo std.png]]"
The name of the team logo file. Dimensions must be 120px x 50px. To upload an image, go to our [$1 upload form].
createteams-create-teams-overwrite-helpe: If checked, then the templates will be overwritten if they already exist.
createteams-create-teams-error-team-name: Team name is empty. Please enter a team name.
It looks like the team name includes an URL. Please enter a clean team name.
createteams-create-teams-error-image-not: Image does not exist. Please upload the team logo first.
createteams-create-error-bad-title: Some of the used characters are not allowed in MediaWiki titles in "$1".
createteams-create-error-edit-already-ex: [[$1]] already exists and was not created.
createteams-create-redirects-redirectove: If checked, then the templates will be overwritten if they already exist.
createteams-create-redirects-error-sourc: Please provide the source and destination of the redirect you want to create.
createteams-move-error-bad-title: Some of the used characters are not allowed in MediaWiki titles in "$1".
createteams-move-error-source-or-destina: Please provide the source and destination for the move.
createteams-view-error-bad-title: Some of the used characters are not allowed in MediaWiki titles in "$1".
createteams-view-error-source-empty: Please provide the name of the template to show.
createteams-delete-teams-error-team-name: Please provide the name of the team.
createteams-delete-error-bad-title: Some of the used characters are not allowed in MediaWiki titles in "$1".
createteams-delete-teams-warning-deletio: WARNING: If you click on "Delete", the team deleted will be the team on the left of the button, not the team above.
createteams-create-teams-historicaltempl: If your template will be at "Template:Team/team liquid", put "team liquid" here.
createteams-create-teams-historicalteam-: This is the subtemplate name, for example if the template name is "Template:Team/team liquid", put "team liquid" here.
createteams-create-teams-historicaltime-: This is the time the team changed, use the YYYY-MM-DD format here.
createteams-create-teams-historicaloverw: If checked, then the templates will be overwritten if they already exist.
createteams-create-teams-historicaltempl: Put the teams and dates so that the most recent version is up top.
createteams-create-error-historical-numb: The number of teams do not correspond to the number of dates. There must be one more team than date.
